member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.AxisLabelsLocation.OutsideTop
member.summary: Places the axis labels at the top, outside of the plotting area.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.AxisLabelsLocation.OutsideBottom
member.summary: Places the axis labels at the bottom, outside of the plotting area

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.AxisLabelsLocation.OutsideLeft
member.summary: Places the axis labels to the left, outside of the plotting area.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.AxisLabelsLocation.OutsideRight
member.summary: Places the axis labels to the right, outside of the plotting area.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.AxisLabelsLocation.InsideTop
member.summary: Places the axis labels inside the plotting area above the axis line.
member.remarks: CrossingAxis should be set for this setting to take effect.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.AxisLabelsLocation.InsideBottom
member.summary: Places the axis labels inside the plotting area below the axis line.
member.remarks: CrossingAxis should be set for this setting to take effect.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.AxisLabelsLocation.InsideLeft
member.summary: Places the axis labels inside the plotting area and to the left of the axis line.
member.remarks: CrossingAxis should be set for this setting to take effect.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.AxisLabelsLocation.InsideRight
member.summary: Places the axis labels inside the plotting area and to the right of the axis line.
member.remarks: CrossingAxis should be set for this setting to take effect.

member.name: T:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ComboDataSourceActionAttribute
member.summary: this is an attribute class which extends the mvc FilterAttribute. It should be put on top of the controller method that should return JSON (even though in the user code it will return Action Result). The idea of this filter is to transform the ActionResult into a JsonResult instance, taking into account filtering Request params. Since MVC doesn't have ViewState, we will need to infer all the features from the request itself, that's the only information we have regarding any previous state.

member.name: M:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ComboDataSourceActionAttribute.OnActionExecuted(System.Web.Mvc.ActionExecutedContext)
member.summary: intercepts the controller call, and transforms the action result into a json result.

member.summary: Update properties of Combo from values modified on client.

remarks.p: Note: that is a wrapper for this.UpdateFromClient(controller, null)

member.param: Reference to controller (in order to get the Request object)
member.returns: True: client value was found and update was successful. False: failure to update.

member.name: M:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ComboModel.UpdateFromClient(System.Web.Mvc.Controller,System.String)
member.summary: Update properties of Combo from values modified on client.

remarks.p: That method can be used by a controller while processing "post" event, when Combo was created other than ComboFor and application needs to change timing of build-in persistance.

member.param: Reference to controller (in order to get the Request object)
Optional ID of Combo. It is used only when this.InputName and this.ID is not set by application.
member.returns: True: client value was found and update was successful. False: failure to update.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ComboModel.HtmlAttributes
member.summary: Sets custom attributes for main html element used by control

remarks.p: Dictionary of attributes passed to TagBuilder.MergeAttributes(value).

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ComboModel.DataSource
member.summary: Set data source for data displayed in list.

remarks.p:
The expected value is instance of IQueryable.
It also can be array of objects, which represent rows in list.
If value is string value, then it is assumed to be an url address which points to source of data.
Example: "http ://odata.netflix.com/Catalog/Titles?$format=json&$callback=?"

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ComboModel.CompactData
member.summary: Set option to pass to client only data with ValueKey and TextKey columns.

remarks.p: That property has effect only when DataSource is IQueryable

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ComboModel.DataSourceUrl
member.summary: Set URL that will be used to fetch data while remote filtering.

remarks.p: A controller should process ComboDataSourceAction and return a View with data source which will be used by Combo to perform filtering.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ComboModel.SelectedIndexes
member.summary: Set gets indexes of selected items in list.

remarks.p: Note: if value is set, then SelectedValues is set to null.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ComboModel.SelectedValues
member.summary: Set gets selected items in list.

remarks.p: Note: if value is set, then SelectedIndexes is set to null.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ComboModel.ID
member.summary: Sets the ID of the Combo.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ComboModel.InputID
member.summary: Sets the id of the input element that will store the value.

remarks.p: If it is not set then the value of ID+'_ig_hidden' is used.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ComboModel.InputName
member.summary: Sets the name of the input element that will store the value. Internal use only.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ComboModel.ValueKey
member.summary: Sets name of column which contains the "value".

remarks.p: If it is missing, then name of first column will be used.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ComboModel.TextKey
member.summary: Sets name of column which contains the displayed text.

remarks.p: If it is missing, then ValueKey will be used.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ComboModel.Width
member.summary: Sets width for control.

remarks.p: Valid html units should be used.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ComboModel.Height
member.summary: Sets height for control.

remarks.p: Valid html units should be used.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ComboModel.ItemSeparator
member.summary: Sets separator between items in field used when MultiSelection is enabled.

remarks.p: Default value is ", ".

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ComboModel.Text
member.summary: Sets text which appears in field when control is created.

remarks.p: Note: If AllowCustomValue is disabled and SelectedIndex or SelectedValues is not set, then first matching item in list will be selected.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ComboModel.NoMatchFoundText
member.summary: Sets text which appears in drop-down list when filtering is enabled and not match items were found.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ComboModel.DropDownButtonTitle
member.summary: Sets text for tooltip of drop-down button.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ComboModel.ClearButtonTitle
member.summary: Sets text for tooltip of clear button.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ComboModel.ItemTemplate
member.summary: Sets template used to render an item in list.

remarks.p:
Notes:
1. The jquery.tmpl.js of Microsoft is used and application should provide supported syntax for content.
2. Template is rendered inside of LI html element.
3. If the "enableCheckboxes" option is enabled, then checkboxes are still supported and rendered.
So, application should consider restriction for layout: do not use "block" html elements and in case of absolutely positioned elements, they should not overlap with checkbox icons.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ComboModel.HeaderTemplate
member.summary: Sets template used to render header in drop-down list.

remarks.p: Template is rendered inside of DIV html element.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ComboModel.FooterTemplate
member.summary: Sets template used to render footer in drop-down list.

remarks.p: Template is rendered inside of DIV html element.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ComboModel.ResponseTotalRecCountKey
member.summary: Sets property in the response specifying the total number of records on the server.

remarks.p: For more information, consult documentation for javascript of $.ig.DataSource.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ComboModel.ResponseDataKey
member.summary: Sets the name of record which holds the list of data rows in response-JSON object and when CompactData is disabled.

remarks.p: Default value is set to "Records". It means that rows of items should belong to the Records object.
For more information, consult documentation for javascript of $.ig.DataSource.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ComboModel.Format
member.summary: Sets format which is applied to items in list.

remarks.p:
Value "auto" will use automatic format for Date and number objects.
Empty value will disable automatic format.
Custom values can be something like "currency", "percent", "dateLong", "time", "MMM-dd-yyyy H:mm tt", etc.
However, custom format should be valid for a specific data type in "textKey" column.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ComboModel.FilteringCondition
member.summary: Sets condition used for filtering.

remarks.p:
That can be any value supported by javascript $.ig.DataSource class. Examples: "startsWith", "contains", "endsWith".
Note: if the "autoComplete" option is enabled, then the "startsWith" is used regardless of value for this option.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ComboModel.NullText
member.summary: Sets text displayed in field when it has no focus and no value.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ComboModel.FilterExprUrlKey
member.summary: Sets url key for the remote filtering.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ComboModel.SelectedValuesType
member.summary: Sets type of values returned from client by the get of SelectedValues property.

remarks.p: Note: if that property is not set, then SelectedValues can return array of string, DateTime or double objects.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ComboModel.AllowCustomValue
member.summary: Sets ability to enter and keep custom value in field.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ComboModel.SelectItemBySpaceKey
member.summary: Sets ability to select active item in list by Space key.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ComboModel.Disabled
member.summary: Sets enabled state of control.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ComboModel.AutoComplete
member.summary: Sets ability to autocomplete field from matching item in list.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ComboModel.EnableActiveItem
member.summary: Sets ability to show active/focus item in drop-down list.

remarks.p: Focus item can be modified by arrow and other action keys and selection can be toggled by the Space key.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ComboModel.DropDownAsChild
member.summary: Sets ability to append container of drop-down list to the body or to the parent of combo.

remarks.p:
If parent of drop-down is body, then list should appear on top other elements on page.
In this case drop-down will not be scrolled with container of Combo. In specific complex layouts it is possible that drop-down list will have wrong location.
If parent of drop-down list is the same as parent of Combo, then scrolling and positioning will be improved.
In this case, if container of Combo has enabled overflow, then visibility of drop-down list rectangle can be cut-off by parent.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ComboModel.Virtualization
member.summary: Sets ability to use virtual rendering for drop-down list.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ComboModel.ShowDropDownButton
member.summary: Sets visibility of drop-down button.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ComboModel.EnableClearButton
member.summary: Sets ability to show a button which allows to clear field.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ComboModel.CaseSensitive
member.summary: Sets ability to use case sensitive or ignore case searching for matches defined by RenderMatchItems and FilteringCondition.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ComboModel.DropDownOnFocus
member.summary: Sets ability to show drop-down list when Combo gets focus.

remarks.p: Note: that property is not related to FilteringType and FilteringCondition.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ComboModel.TabIndex
member.summary: Sets tabIndex attribute to input field.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ComboModel.DropDownWidth
member.summary: Sets width of drop-down list in pixels.

remarks.p: Default value is 0 and width of combo is used.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ComboModel.DropDownMaxHeight
member.summary: Sets maximum height of drop-down list in pixels.

remarks.p: Default value is 300.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ComboModel.DropDownMinHeight
member.summary: Sets minimum height of drop-down list in pixels.

remarks.p: Default value is 0.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ComboModel.AnimationShowDuration
member.summary: Sets duration of show drop-down list animation in milliseconds.

remarks.p: Default value is 400.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ComboModel.AnimationHideDuration
member.summary: Sets duration of hide drop-down list animation in milliseconds.

remarks.p: Default value is 400.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ComboModel.FilteringType
member.summary: Sets type of filtering.

remarks.p: If this property is set to Remote, then the css class "waitFiltering" is applied to combo and its drop-down list, and MultiSelection option is not supported.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ComboModel.RenderMatchItemsCondition
member.summary: Sets condition used for rendering of matching parts in items of drop-down list.

remarks.p: Note: that property is not related to FilteringType and FilteringCondition.

remarks.p: That value is assign to schema of javascript $.ig.DataSource class.

member.summary: Update properties of Combo from values modified on client.

remarks.p:
That method can be used, when Combo was created other than ComboFor and application needs to change timing of build-in persistance.
Example:
Html.Infragistics().Combo().ID("Combo1").DataSource(new int[]{1,2,3}).UpdateFromClient(this.Request).Render()

Optional ID of Combo. It is used only when this.InputName and this.ID is not set by application.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ColumnFilteringSetting.FilterCondition
member.summary: Predefined (initial) filtering condition for the column. Default is auto. Filtering conditions are: contains startsWith endsWith doesNotContain equals doesNotEqual greaterThan lessThan greaterThanOrEqualTo lessThanOrEqualTo null notNull empty notEmpty today, yesterday, on, notOn, thisMonth, lastMonth, nextMonth, thisYear, lastYear, nextYear

member.summary:
The options for editor. That should include pairs of specific option and its value in javascript format for an object. Name of option and value should be separated by the ":" character and pairs should be separated by the "," character.
Example for mask editor: "inputMask:'(000) 000-0000'"
Example for numeric editor: "button:'spin',maxValue:1000,minValue:0"

member.name: T:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.GridDataSourceActionAttribute
member.summary: this is an attribute class which extends the mvc FilterAttribute. It should be put on top of the controller method that should return JSON (even though in the user code it will return Action Result). The idea of this filter is to transform the ActionResult into a JsonResult instance, taking into account all Request params such as paging, sorting, and filtering. Since MVC doesn't have ViewState, we will need to infer all the features from the request itself, that's the only information we have regarding any previous state.

member.summary: intercepts the controller call, and transforms the action result into a json result.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.GridColumn.Format
member.summary:
format for cells
If DataType is "date", then supported formats are following:
"date", "dateLong", "dateTime", "time", "timeLong", "MM/dd/yyyy", "MMM-d, yy, h:mm:ss tt", "dddd d MMM", etc.
If DataType is "number" or not set, then supported numeric formats are following:
"number", "currency", "percent", "int", "double", "0.00", "#.0####", "0", "#.#######", etc. The value of "double" will be similar to "number", but with unlimited maximum number of decimal places
If DataType is "string" or not set, then format is rendered as it is with replacement of possible "{0}" flag by value in cell
Example, if format is set to "Name: {0}" and value in cell is "Bob", then value will appear as "Name: Bob"

member.name: M:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.CurrencyEditorWrapper.ValidatorOptions
member.summary: Enables validation with default options.

remarks.p: If Required is enabled, then validation message will appear if edit field is empty.
If MinValue and or MaxValue is set, then validation message will appear if editor has value outside of these limits.
Validation message will appear if entered value is invalid number (for example, user entered only "." or "-").

member.name: M:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.CurrencyEditorWrapper.ValidatorOptions(System.Nullable{Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ValidatorKeepFocus},System.Nullable{System.Boolean},System.Nullable{System.Boolean},System.Nullable{System.Boolean},System.String)
member.summary: Enables validation with explicit basic options

remarks.p: In order to set other validator options, the ValidatorOptions(Action) setter should be used.

member.param: Action related to keeping focus in editor when validation failed
Trigger validation when editor loses focus
Trigger validation when text in editor was changed (including keypress)
Trigger validation when form gets onsubmit event
Custom error message which replaces all specific error messages

member.summary: Wrapper for model.

member.name: M:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.DatePickerWrapper.ValidatorOptions
member.summary: Enables validation with default options.

remarks.p: Validation message will appear if not all required date fields are entered.
If Required is enabled, then validation message will appear if edit field is empty.
If MinValue and or MaxValue is set, then validation message will appear if editor has value outside of these limits.
If day-field has value larger than maximum number of days in month, then validation message will appear.

member.summary: Wrapper for model.

member.name: M:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.DateTimeEditorWrapper.ValidatorOptions
member.summary: Enables validation with default options.

remarks.p: Validation message will appear if not all required date fields are entered.
If Required is enabled, then validation message will appear if edit field is empty.
If MinValue and or MaxValue is set, then validation message will appear if editor has value outside of these limits.
If day-field has value larger than maximum number of days in month, then validation message will appear.

remarks.p: In order to set other validator options, the ValidatorOptions(Action) setter should be used.

member.name: T:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.CurrencyEditorModel

member.summary: Constructor for CurrencyEditorModel

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.CurrencyEditorModel.ID
member.summary: Gets/sets the ID of control on client. Required property.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.CurrencyEditorModel.InputID
member.summary: Sets the id of the input element that will store the value.

remarks.p: If it is not set then the value of ID+'_ig_hidden' is used.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.CurrencyEditorModel.InputName
member.summary: Sets the name of the input element that will store the value.

remarks.p: If it is not set then the value of ID is used.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.CurrencyEditorModel.HtmlAttributes
member.summary: Sets custom attributes for main html element used by control.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.CurrencyEditorModel.Value
member.summary: Sets initial value for editor.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.CurrencyEditorModel.ButtonType
member.summary: Sets option to show drop-down or spin buttons.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.CurrencyEditorModel.TextAlignment
member.summary: Sets text alignment in editor.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.CurrencyEditorModel.SelectionOnFocus
member.summary: Sets type of selection when editor gets focus.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.CurrencyEditorModel.Disabled
member.summary: Sets enabled state of control.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.CurrencyEditorModel.ReadOnly
member.summary: Sets read only state of control.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.CurrencyEditorModel.SpinOnReadOnly
member.summary: Allows spin value (by up/down arrow keys and spin buttons) when ReadOnly is enabled.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.CurrencyEditorModel.DropDownOnReadOnly
member.summary: Allows to show drop-down list and change value from list when ReadOnly is enabled.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.CurrencyEditorModel.Width
member.summary: Sets width of editor in pixels.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.CurrencyEditorModel.Height
member.summary: Sets height of editor in pixels.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.CurrencyEditorModel.HideEnterKey
member.summary: Hides the Enter key from browser. If true hides the Enter key, if false does not change default logic of browser related to the Enter key.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.CurrencyEditorModel.DropDownTriggers
member.summary: Sets the list of actions/flags which will be used to open drop-down list. List of actions/flags. Actions should be separated by the "," character and following flags can be used: button,focus,ctrl+arrow,alt+arrow,shift+arrow. Explicit characters can be used as well. For example: A,D,2 etc.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.CurrencyEditorModel.NullText
member.summary: Sets text which will be displayed in editor when it has no value and no focus.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.CurrencyEditorModel.ListItems
member.summary: Sets list of items used for drop-down list.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.CurrencyEditorModel.Theme
member.summary: Sets theme for editor. Note: in order for that option to have effect, the css classes with "theme" selectors should be available for page.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.CurrencyEditorModel.RenderInContainer
member.summary: Sets option to wrap input field into SPAN. Default is false. This option is available only when base element is INPUT or TEXTAREA. If drop-down button or spin-buttons are enabled or the theme is set, then this option has no effect. The reason for this option is to allow vertical alignment of several igEditor controls when they are located in html inline and some of them have enabled buttons. If all editors are created within SPAN wrapper, then they will appear on the same line. Otherwise, editors in SPANs will be shifted 3-6 pixels above INPUT editors.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.CurrencyEditorModel.Required
member.summary: Sets/gets required entry.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.CurrencyEditorModel.ValidatorOptions
member.summary: Sets validator options. Note: this option will have effect only when application registers ig.ui.validator.js and ig.ui.validator.css.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.CurrencyEditorModel.ListWidth
member.summary: Sets drop-down list width in pixels.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.CurrencyEditorModel.ListMaxHeight
member.summary: Sets drop-down list maximum height in pixels.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.CurrencyEditorModel.ListColumns
member.summary: Sets drop-down list number of columns.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.CurrencyEditorModel.AnimationShowDuration
member.summary: Sets duration of animation in milliseconds while showing drop-down list.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.CurrencyEditorModel.AnimationHideDuration
member.summary: Sets duration of animation in milliseconds while hiding drop-down list.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.CurrencyEditorModel.ListDropDownAsChild
member.summary: Sets drop-down list as child of editor. If true create html element which represents drop-down list as child of editor, if false use the body as parent for drop-down list.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.CurrencyEditorModel.Regional
member.summary: Sets name of regional setting. Name of culture/country. For example, "bg", "fr", etc. Note: in order for that setting to have effect, an object with name $.ui.igEditor.regional["localeCode"] should be availble on client.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.CurrencyEditorModel.PositivePattern
member.summary: Sets custom pattern which is used to display positive numbers in no focus state. Format used for positive numbers. Default value is defined by current culture/regional.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.CurrencyEditorModel.NegativePattern
member.summary: Sets custom pattern which is used to display negative numbers in no focus state. Format used for negative numbers. Default value is defined by current culture/regional.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.CurrencyEditorModel.Symbol
member.summary: Sets currency symbol. That is used when editor has no focus. Default value is defined by current culture/regional.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.CurrencyEditorModel.MinValue
member.summary: Sets minimum number which can be entered by user.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.CurrencyEditorModel.MaxValue
member.summary: Sets maximum number which can be entered by user.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.CurrencyEditorModel.MaxDecimals
member.summary: Sets maximum number of decimal places displayed in editor when it has no focus. Number of decimal places. Default value is defined by current culture/regional.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.CurrencyEditorModel.MinDecimals
member.summary: Sets minimum number of decimal places displayed in editor when it has no focus. Number of decimal places. Default value is defined by current culture/regional.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.CurrencyEditorModel.DataMode
member.summary: Sets data mode. That affects the get/set value method.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.CurrencyEditorModel.DecimalSeparator
member.summary: Sets the character which is used as decimal separator. Default value is defined by current culture/regional.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.CurrencyEditorModel.GroupSeparator
member.summary: Sets the character which is used as group/thousand separator. That setting has effect only when editor has no focus. Default value is defined by current culture/regional.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.CurrencyEditorModel.ScientificFormat
member.summary: Enables scientific format to display numeric value.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.CurrencyEditorModel.NullValue
member.summary: Sets numeric value which is used by editor when no value was entered (or value is null). That also is used by get/set value method when value in editor is not set. Number which is used as replacement for not set value or null value.

member.summary: Gets/sets the ID of control on client. Required property.

remarks.p: If it is not set then the value of ID+'_ig_hidden' is used.

member.summary: Sets custom attributes for main html element used by control

member.summary: Sets initial value for editor.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.MaskEditorModel.ButtonType
member.summary: Sets option to show drop-down or spin buttons.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.MaskEditorModel.TextAlignment
member.summary: Sets text alignment in editor. Default value is Left.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.MaskEditorModel.SelectionOnFocus
member.summary: Sets type of selection when editor gets focus.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.MaskEditorModel.Disabled
member.summary: Sets enabled state of control.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.MaskEditorModel.ReadOnly
member.summary: Sets read only state of control.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.MaskEditorModel.SpinOnReadOnly
member.summary: Allows spin value (by up/down arrow keys and spin buttons) when ReadOnly is enabled.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.MaskEditorModel.DropDownOnReadOnly
member.summary: Allows to show drop-down list and change value from list when ReadOnly is enabled.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.MaskEditorModel.Width
member.summary: Sets width of editor in pixels.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.MaskEditorModel.Height
member.summary: Sets height of editor in pixels.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.MaskEditorModel.ToUpper
member.summary: Converts entries to upper case.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.MaskEditorModel.ToLower
member.summary: Converts entries to lower case.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.MaskEditorModel.HideEnterKey
member.summary: Hides the Enter key from browser. If true hides the Enter key, if false does not change default logic of browser related to the Enter key.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.MaskEditorModel.IncludeKeys
member.summary: Sets the list of keys which will be accepted by editor. Any key not included in list will be ignored while keyboard entries.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.MaskEditorModel.ExcludeKeys
member.summary: Sets the list of keys which will be excluded by editor while keyboard entries.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.MaskEditorModel.DropDownTriggers
member.summary: Sets the list of actions/flags which will be used to open drop-down list. List of actions/flags. Actions should be separated by the "," character and following flags can be used: button,focus,ctrl+arrow,alt+arrow,shift+arrow. Explicit characters can be used as well. For example: A,D,2 etc.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.MaskEditorModel.NullText
member.summary: Sets text which will be displayed in editor when it has no value and no focus.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.MaskEditorModel.ListItems
member.summary: Sets list of items used for drop-down list.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.MaskEditorModel.Theme
member.summary: Sets theme for editor. Note: in order for that option to have effect, the css classes with "theme" selectors should be available for page.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.MaskEditorModel.RenderInContainer
member.summary: Sets option to wrap input field into SPAN. Default is false. This option is available only when base element is INPUT or TEXTAREA. If drop-down button or spin-buttons are enabled or the theme is set, then this option has no effect. The reason for this option is to allow vertical alignment of several igEditor controls when they are located in html inline and some of them have enabled buttons. If all editors are created within SPAN wrapper, then they will appear on the same line. Otherwise, editors in SPANs will be shifted 3-6 pixels above INPUT editors.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.MaskEditorModel.Required
member.summary: Sets/gets required entry.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.MaskEditorModel.ValidatorOptions
member.summary: Sets validator options. Note: this option will have effect only when application registers ig.ui.validator.js and ig.ui.validator.css.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.MaskEditorModel.ListWidth
member.summary: Sets drop-down list width in pixels.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.MaskEditorModel.ListMaxHeight
member.summary: Sets drop-down list maximum height in pixels.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.MaskEditorModel.ListColumns
member.summary: Sets drop-down list number of columns.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.MaskEditorModel.AnimationShowDuration
member.summary: Sets duration of animation in milliseconds while showing drop-down list.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.MaskEditorModel.AnimationHideDuration
member.summary: Sets duration of animation in milliseconds while hiding drop-down list.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.MaskEditorModel.ListDropDownAsChild
member.summary: Sets drop-down list as child of editor. If true create html element which represents drop-down list as child of editor, if false use the body as parent for drop-down list.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.MaskEditorModel.ListMatchIgnoreCase
member.summary: If true ignores case while matching, if false performs case sensitive mathcing.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.MaskEditorModel.ListMatchOnly
member.summary: If true allows entries which will match with items in list, if false does not perform validation for match.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.MaskEditorModel.ListMatchContains
member.summary: If true validates entries to match anywhere within items, if false validates entries to match with items from beginning.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.MaskEditorModel.ListAutoComplete
member.summary: If true performs autocomplete of value in editor from matching item in list on blur.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.MaskEditorModel.InputMask
member.summary: Sets the input mask.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.MaskEditorModel.DataMode
member.summary: Sets data mode. That affects the get/set value method and paste operation.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.MaskEditorModel.PromptCharacter
member.summary: Sets the character which is used for available positions in mask when editor has focus.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.MaskEditorModel.PadCharacter
member.summary: Sets the character which is used for available positions in mask when editor has no focus.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.MaskEditorModel.EmptyCharacter
member.summary: Sets the character which is used for available positions in mask. That option affects only string returned by the get of the value() method.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.MaskEditorModel.HideMaskOnFocus
member.summary: Hides or shows input mask when editor gets focus. True: hide input mask, false: show all input mask with prompts when editor gets focus.

member.summary: Sets custom pattern which is used to display negative numbers in no focus state. Format used for negative numbers. Default value is defined by current culture/regional.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.PercentEditorModel.Symbol
member.summary: Sets percent symbol. That is used when editor has no focus. Default value is defined by current culture/regional.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.PercentEditorModel.MinValue
member.summary: Sets minimum number which can be entered by user.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.PercentEditorModel.MaxValue
member.summary: Sets maximum number which can be entered by user.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.PercentEditorModel.MinDecimals
member.summary: Sets minimum number of decimal places displayed in editor when it has no focus. Number of decimal places. Default value is defined by current culture/regional.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.PercentEditorModel.MaxDecimals
member.summary: Sets maximum number of decimal places displayed in editor when it has no focus. Number of decimal places. Default value is defined by current culture/regional.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.PercentEditorModel.DisplayFactor
member.summary: Sets the factor which used for the get and set of the "value" method. On get the number (string) entered by user is divided by that factor and on the set the number (string) displayed in editor is multiplied by that factor. For example if factor is 100 and the "value" is set to 0.123, then editor will show string "12.3".
member.remarks: The value should be a power of 10. If another value is supplied the biggest number that is a power of 10 and is less than the supplied value will be used. Values less than or equal to 0 will be ignored. Note: this option has priority over possible regional settings.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.PercentEditorModel.DataMode
member.summary: Sets data mode. That affects the get/set value method.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.PercentEditorModel.DecimalSeparator
member.summary: Sets the character which is used as decimal separator. Default value is defined by current culture/regional.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.PercentEditorModel.GroupSeparator
member.summary: Sets the character which is used as group/thousand separator. That setting has effect only when editor has no focus. Default value is defined by current culture/regional.

member.summary: Enables scientific format to display numeric value.

member.summary: Sets numeric value which is used by editor when no value was entered (or value is null). That also is used by get/set value method when value in editor is not set. Number which is used as replacement for not set value or null value.

member.name: T:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.RatingModel
member.summary: Class describing options available for the Rating.

member.name: M:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.RatingModel.#ctor
member.summary: Create RatingModel

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.RatingModel.ID
member.summary: Sets the ID of the rating.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.RatingModel.InputID
member.summary: Sets the id of the input element that will store the value.

remarks.p: If it is not set then the value of ID+'_ig_hidden' is used.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.RatingModel.InputName
member.summary: Sets the name of the input element that will store the value.

remarks.p: If it is not set then the value of ID is used.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.RatingModel.HtmlAttributes
member.summary: Sets custom attributes for main html element used by control

remarks.p: Dictionary of attributes passed to TagBuilder.MergeAttributes(value).

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.RatingModel.Value
member.summary: Sets initial value for control.

remarks.p: Value in range from 0 to 1. Default value in the widget is 0.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.RatingModel.VoteCount
member.summary: Sets number of vote items.

remarks.p: Default value in the widget is 5.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.RatingModel.Vertical
member.summary: Sets vertical orientation of control.

remarks.p: Default value in the widget is false and control has horizontal orientation.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.RatingModel.Precision
member.summary: Sets precision.

remarks.p: Exact, half or whole. Default value in the widget is Exact.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.RatingModel.Disabled
member.summary: Sets disabled state of control.

remarks.p: Default value in the widget is false.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.RatingModel.SwapDirection
member.summary: Sets swaped direction from left to right or from top to bottom in case of vertical orientation.

remarks.p: Default value in the widget is false.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.RatingModel.Focusable
member.summary: Sets option to enable control getting focus.

remarks.p: Default value in the widget is true.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.RatingModel.VoteItemWidth
member.summary: Sets width of vote item in pixels.

remarks.p: Default value in the widget is not set and width is defined by css classes.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.RatingModel.VoteItemHeight
member.summary: Sets height of vote item in pixels.

remarks.p: Default value in the widget is not set and height is defined by css classes.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.RatingModel.ValueAsPercent
member.summary: Sets option to use percentage units or vote-number units for the Value and HoverValue.

remarks.p: True: the percent (from 0 to 1) is used for value. False: the value is measured in number of votes. Default value in the widget is true.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.RatingModel.RoundedDecimalPlaces
member.summary: Sets number of decimal places used to round value.

remarks.p: To disable rounding that property should be set to -1. Default value in the widget is 3.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.RatingModel.Theme
member.summary: Sets theme for control. Note: in order for that option to have effect, the css classes with "theme" selectors should be available for page.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.RatingModel.PrecisionZeroVote
member.summary: Sets part of vote-size, which is considered as zero value.

remarks.p: It has effect only when precision is set to "half" or "whole". If user clicks between edge of the first vote and (sizeOfVote * precisionZeroVote), then value is set to 0. Same is applied for mouseover as well. Default is 0.25.

member.name: T:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ValidatorModel
member.summary: Class describing the options available for the Validator.

member.name: M:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ValidatorModel.#ctor
member.summary: ValidatorModel constructor.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ValidatorModel.ID
member.summary: Sets the ID of the target control.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ValidatorModel.MaxValue
member.summary: Sets the maximum value allowed in the target control.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ValidatorModel.MinValue
member.summary: Sets the minimum value allowed in the target control.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ValidatorModel.MaxLength
member.summary: Sets the maximum length of the string or the selected items allowed in the target control.

remarks.p: Maximum number of characters in the target element if target allows to enter text (INPUT, TEXTAREA), or maximum number of selected items when target is SELECT-multiple or checkboxes with same name.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ValidatorModel.MinLength
member.summary: Sets minimum length of string or selected items allowed in target control.

remarks.p: Maximum number of characters in target element if target allows to enter text (INPUT, TEXTAREA), or maximum number of selected items when target is SELECT-multiple or checkboxes with same name.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ValidatorModel.AnimationShowDuration
member.summary: Sets duration of animation in milliseconds which shows error message.

remarks.p: Default value is 300.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ValidatorModel.AnimationHideDuration
member.summary: Sets duration of animation in milliseconds which hides error message.

remarks.p: Default value is 300.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ValidatorModel.Required
member.summary: Sets validation for not empty value in target control. Default value is false and validation is disabled.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ValidatorModel.ErrorMessage
member.summary: Sets the custom error message.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ValidatorModel.RegExp
member.summary: Sets the javascript regular expression which method "test()" will be used for validation of value in control.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ValidatorModel.ConditionalMessages
member.summary: Sets predefined conditional error messages.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ValidatorModel.Alignment
member.summary: Sets the alignment of error message relative to target control. Default value is Bottom.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ValidatorModel.KeepFocusOnError
member.summary: Sets option to keep focus in control when validation fails and control loses focus.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ValidatorModel.ShowIcon
member.summary: Sets option to show or hide error icon which is displayed inside of error label in front of error text.validation for not empty value in target control. True: show error icon, false: do not show error icon. Default value is true.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ValidatorModel.ValidateOnBlur
member.summary: Sets option to triggers validation when control loses focus.

remarks.p: True: validate onblur event of browser, false: do not validate on blur. Default value is true.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ValidatorModel.ValidateOnChange
member.summary: Sets option to triggers validation when value in control changes.

remarks.p: True: validate onchange, onkeydown, etc. events of browser, false: do not validate on change. Default value is true.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ValidatorModel.ValidateOnSubmit
member.summary: Sets option to triggers validation when the onsubmit event is raised on client.

remarks.p: True: validate onsubmit event of browser, false: do not validate onsubmit. Default value is true.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ValidatorModel.ValidateOnFormSubmit
member.summary: Sets option to triggers validation when the form.submit() method is called by application on client.

remarks.p: True: validate when form.submit() was called, false: do not validate form.submit(). Default value is false.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ValidatorModel.BodyAsParent
member.summary: Sets option to use the BODY or local-parent of target as the parent element for error message. Default value is true and the BODY is used.

member.summary: Wrapper for model.

member.summary: Render the validator widget with the accumulated model changes in the wrapper.
member.returns: A HTML script tag that adds the validator widget.

member.summary: A reference to the model for this wrapper.

member.name: T:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.VideoPlayerModel
member.summary: Model containing the options for the VideoPlayer widget.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.VideoPlayerModel.ID
member.summary: Set the ID of the div on which the VideoPlayer widget will be created.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.VideoPlayerModel.HtmlAttributes
member.summary: Sets custom attributes of the div on which the VideoPlayer widget will be created.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.VideoPlayerModel.Sources
member.summary: Set a list of video sources to choose from. Best coded/format is automatically detected by this control. Supported types are depending on the browser and could be one of the following mov, mp4, webm, ogv.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.VideoPlayerModel.Width
member.summary: Set the width of the control. By default null will stretch the control to fit data, if no other widths are defined.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.VideoPlayerModel.Height
member.summary: Set the height of the control. By default null will stretch the control to fit data, if no other heights are defined.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.VideoPlayerModel.PosterUrl
member.summary: Set a URL to an image to show, when no video data is available.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.VideoPlayerModel.Preload
member.summary: Set whether to preload load inital data for duration of video. If true it may start buffering the video, but this highly depends on the specific browser implementation.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.VideoPlayerModel.Autoplay
member.summary: Set whether the video should start playing immediately after the control is loaded.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.VideoPlayerModel.Autohide
member.summary: Set whether player controls will auto hide when video is not hovered. This is applicable only when Infragistics playback controls are used.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.VideoPlayerModel.VolumeAutohideDelay
member.summary: Set volume slider auto hide delay. This is applicable only when Infragistics playback controls are used.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.VideoPlayerModel.Loop
member.summary: Set whether the video to start again after it has ended.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.VideoPlayerModel.BrowserControls
member.summary: Set whether if you want to use the built in browser controls. By default player uses Infragistics playback controls. Note that you may have different look and feel accross different browsers if you use the built in browser controls.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.VideoPlayerModel.Fullscreen
member.summary: Set whether the video player to be in full screen or not. This is not a pure full screen, because browsers do not allow that. It just sets 100% width and height to the control.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.VideoPlayerModel.Volume
member.summary: Set the video volume. It can be between 0.0 and 1.0.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.VideoPlayerModel.Muted
member.summary: Set whether video volume is muted.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.VideoPlayerModel.Title
member.summary: Set video title.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.VideoPlayerModel.ShowSeekTime
member.summary: Set whether the control seek tool tip will be shown when hovering the video progress bar.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.VideoPlayerModel.ProgressLabelFormat
member.summary: Sets the format of the video progress label. You should use ${currentTime} to represent current playback position and ${duration} to represent video duration.
